idsDocument.name: BenefitPlan
idsDocument.elementOrder: Payer, PlanName, PlanType, ProductType, BucketOptions, InOutNetworkDetermination, PremiumBillingGL, ClaimsAccountsPayableGL, CapitationAccountsPayableGL, CapitationReceiptAndReconciliationGL, CoverageType, BillType, DeductibleToMoop, AllEncountersToMoop, CarryoverClass, PremiumPaymentsSavingsPercentage, PhoneNumber, FaxNumber, PlanAddress, AlternateClaimAddress, PlanShortName, RecordStatus, GenerateExplanationOfBenefits, MedicareSecondaryPayerType, OverridePayer, CarrierId, AllowPcpEditing, DefaultCopay, AlternatePlanIdForRevenue, IsPlanGeneric, NameOptions, ClaimMail, CodeOnPaperClaims, CodeOnElectronicClaims, PayerOrgId, MedigapNumber, MedigapPlan, CrossoverApplication, VoidedDemandReprint, PaperClaims, FinancialClass, AlternateClaimPhoneNumber, ExcludeProfessionalBillingFilingOrder, ClaimDefaultPlanId, ClaimResubmissionZeroBalance, SubmittedOnDemandClaimZero, PaidDemandClaim, ClaimGroupingPointerId, ResubmitZeroDollarClaims, SubmitZeroDollarInsuranceClaims, DemandZeroComponentGroupId, PaperClaimsReconciliation, ElectronicClaimsReconciliation, PrintedTaxonomy, InpatientPartBClaims, SupplementalPaymentPayerId, SupplementalPaymentPlanId, MaximumServiceLinesCmsClaim, AdjustmentsGroupSecondaryClaims, BenefitAdjustment, DefaultChargeTableId, ChargeTableMedicationChargeId, AdjudicatesChargeVia, CoveredPercentage, AdjudicatesPayerAndPatient, CopyImeLines, UseInSharedCoverages, AdmissionBilling, CreatingSecondCoverageId, PreventSecondCoveragePlan, LifetimeInformation, AnesthesiaInformation, FinancialClassInformation, ExtraInformation, Subscribers

changeLog.change: Changed BucketOptions from String to SourceCode
Added SourceStatusCode to instance and collection items.

include.name: CommonElements
include.appendToElementOrder: ExtendedAttributes, SourceStatusCode, SourceCreatedDate, SourceCreatedBy, SourceModifiedDate, SourceModifiedBy

idsDocument.documentation: Use this structure to feed Benefit Plan information.

element.name: Payer
element.documentation: The unique ID of the payer associated with this benefit plan.

element.name: PlanName
element.documentation: The name of the benefit plan record.

element.name: PlanType
element.documentation: Indicates whether this EPP record is a benefit plan or a benefit plan rider.

element.name: ProductType
element.documentation: The benefit plan's product type (i.e. HMO, PPO, Medicare, etc.)

element.name: BucketOptions
element.documentation: The override of the manage care system profile setting for benefit bucket options.
element.question: Changed from int to SourceCode

element.name: InOutNetworkDetermination
element.documentation: The override of the manage care system profile setting for in or out of network determination.

element.name: PremiumBillingGL
element.documentation: The G/L segment value for this benefit plan for premium billing G/L transactions.

element.name: ClaimsAccountsPayableGL
element.documentation: The G/L segment value for this benefit plan for AP claims G/L transactions.

element.name: CapitationAccountsPayableGL
element.documentation: The G/L segment value for this benefit plan for capitation AP G/L transactions.

element.name: CapitationReceiptAndReconciliationGL
element.documentation: The G/L segment value for this benefit plan for capitation receipt and reconciliation G/L transactions.

element.name: CoverageType
element.documentation: Indicates whether coverage records created under this benefit plan are managed care coverages or indemnity coverages.

element.name: BillType
element.documentation: Deprecated. Please use EPP-85 instead.

element.name: DeductibleToMoop
element.documentation: Indicates whether or not the amount of the deductible payment should be counted toward the MOOP (Maximum Out of Pocket) limit.

element.name: AllEncountersToMoop
element.documentation: Indicates whether contributions to the All Encounters deductible bucket will be applied to all specified MOOP buckets, regardless of the network status of the encounter.

element.name: CarryoverClass
element.documentation: The system uses this carryover class and another class defined in the source or target plan/package to determine what carryover mapping table to be used in the carryover.

element.name: PremiumPaymentsSavingsPercentage
element.documentation: This is the percentage amount multiplied against premium payments in determining the amount by which benefit buckets should accumulate.

element.name: PhoneNumber
element.documentation: The phone number of the benefit plan.

element.name: FaxNumber
element.documentation: The fax number of the benefit plan.

group.name: PlanAddress
group.elementOrder: AddressLine1, AddressLine2, AddressLine3, AddressLine4, City, StateProvince, PostalCode, Country, CountyRegion, District
group.documentation: Collection used for communicating the Benefit Plan Address.

element.name: AddressLine1
element.documentation: This field specifies the street or mailing address of a person or institution. When referencing an institution, this first component is used to specify the institution name. When used in connection with a person, this component specifies the first line of the address.

element.name: AddressLine2
element.documentation: This field specifies the second line of address. In general, it qualifies address. Examples: Suite 555 or Fourth Floor. When referencing an institution, this component specifies the street address.

element.name: AddressLine3
element.documentation: This field specifies the name of the person or organization that should appear as part of the address. This is also known as the "Care of" or "C/O" line.

element.name: AddressLine4
element.documentation: This field specifies more address information.

element.name: City
element.documentation: This field specifies the city, district or place where the addressee is located depending upon the national convention for formatting addresses for postal usage.

element.name: StateProvince
element.documentation: This field specifies the state or province where the addressee is located. State or province should be represented by the official postal service codes for that country.

element.name: PostalCode
element.documentation: This component specifies the zip or postal code where the addressee is located. Zip or postal codes should be represented by the official codes for that country. In the US, the zip code takes the form 99999[-9999], while the Canadian postal code takes the form A9A9A9 and the Australian Postcode takes the form 9999.

element.name: Country
element.documentation: This component specifies the country where the addressee is located. HL7 specifies that the 3-character (alphabetic) form of ISO 3166 be used for the country code.

element.name: CountyRegion
element.documentation: This component specifies the county where the addressee is located when applicable.

element.name: District
element.documentation: The district of the benefit plan address.

group.name: AlternateClaimAddress
group.documentation: Collection used for communicating the Alternate Claim Address.

element.name: City
element.documentation: The city of the alternate claim address.

element.name: StateProvince
element.documentation: The state of the alternate claim address.

element.name: PostalCode
element.documentation: The state of the alternate claim address.

element.name: PlanShortName
element.documentation: The phone number of the benefit plan.

element.name: RecordStatus
element.documentation: The record status of the benefit payer/plan record (e.g. active, inactive, etc.).

element.name: GenerateExplanationOfBenefits
element.documentation: Indicates if you want to generate an EOB for AP claims of those members using this benefit plan when there is any patient payment on the claim. Y indicates that you want to generate an EOB. A null value indicates that you don't want to generate EOB. An N will not be populated for this column.

element.name: MedicareSecondaryPayerType
element.documentation: Classifies this plan such that Medicare Secondary payer logic can decide whether it should be before or after Medicare in the filing order for an encounter.

element.name: OverridePayer
element.documentation: Override payer for MSPQ

element.name: CarrierId
element.documentation: The unique ID of the carrier

element.name: AllowPcpEditing
element.documentation: In table CLARITY_EPP, the column ALLOW_PCP_EDITIN_YN (EPP/18200) has been deprecated. This column has been replaced by column ALLOW_PCP_EDITING_C (EPP/18200) in the table CLARITY_EPP_2. To look up the deprecated column's value(the category title) after the Clarity Compass upgrade, join column CLARITY_EPP_2.ALLOW_PCP_EDITING_C to table ZC_ALLOW_PCP_EDIT column TITLE to get the TITLE value.

element.name: DefaultCopay
element.documentation: Indicates the default copay.

element.name: AlternatePlanIdForRevenue
element.documentation: Alternate Plan Identifier for Revenue Code

element.name: IsPlanGeneric
element.documentation: Indicates whether this benefit plan is generic.

element.name: NameOptions
element.documentation: If the "Claim Mail Code" (BenefitClaimMail) is set to 3-Send Claim to payer Plan, this field indicates whether the plan should be used on claims. If this field is set to 2-No, the payer name will be used on claims.

element.name: ClaimMail
element.documentation: Default mail code for coverages with this benefit plan.

element.name: CodeOnPaperClaims
element.documentation: Text for plan code to be printed on paper claims.

element.name: CodeOnElectronicClaims
element.documentation: Text for plan code to be printed on electronic claims.

element.name: PayerOrgId
element.documentation: Plan's payer organization ID. Used to populate L2010BB/NM1-09 (Professional), L2010BC/NM1-09 (Institutional), or L2330B/NM1-09 (ANSI 837) fields.

element.name: MedigapNumber
element.documentation: Plan's Medigap Number. Used to populate L2010BB/NM1-09 and L2330B/NM1-09 fields on ANSI 837 format.

element.name: MedigapPlan
element.documentation: Indicates if plan is a Medigap plan.

element.name: CrossoverApplication
element.documentation: Indicates the billing application for which the Medigap setting should represent a crossover relationship.

element.name: VoidedDemandReprint
element.documentation: Indicates whether voided transactions will appear on demand reprint claims.

element.name: PaperClaims
element.documentation: Indicates whether only paper claims should be created for this plan.

element.name: FinancialClass
element.documentation: The appropriate financial class for this plan.

element.name: AlternateClaimPhoneNumber
element.documentation: Stores alternate claim phone number

element.name: ExcludeProfessionalBillingFilingOrder
element.documentation: Indicates whether this plan should be excluded in PB filing order.

element.name: ClaimDefaultPlanId
element.documentation: Default claim definition record to use for claims to this plan.

element.name: ClaimResubmissionZeroBalance
element.documentation: Indicates whether this plan accepts claim resubmission with zero insurance balance.

element.name: SubmittedOnDemandClaimZero
element.documentation: Indicates whether charges associated with this benefit plan should be submitted on a demand claim when the insurance balance is zero due to payments or credit adjustments.

element.name: PaidDemandClaim
element.documentation: Indicates whether charges associated with this benefit plan should be submitted on a demand claim when the insurance balance is zero due to payments or credit adjustments.

element.name: ClaimGroupingPointerId
element.documentation: Claim grouping pointer for this benefit plan.

element.name: ResubmitZeroDollarClaims
element.documentation: Component Group ID to allow resubmission of claims with zero dollar balance.

element.name: SubmitZeroDollarInsuranceClaims
element.documentation: The Component group ID for submit zero dollar insurance claims.

element.name: DemandZeroComponentGroupId
element.documentation: Component Group ID for submit zero dollar insurance demand claims.

element.name: PaperClaimsReconciliation
element.documentation: Indicates whether paper claim activity for this benefit plan is recorded in the Claims Reconciliation Database (CRD).

element.name: ElectronicClaimsReconciliation
element.documentation: Indicates whether electronic claim activity for this benefit plan is recorded in the Claims Reconciliation Database (CRD).

element.name: PrintedTaxonomy
element.documentation: Indicates whether the taxonomy code is printed on ANSI institutional claims at the L2000A level and FL 81 on UB04 paper claims.

element.name: InpatientPartBClaims
element.documentation: Indicates whether inpatient claims should be Part B claims for this plan.

element.name: SupplementalPaymentPayerId
element.documentation: Payer ID for Medicare for supplemental payment (IME) claims

element.name: SupplementalPaymentPlanId
element.documentation: Plan ID for Medicare for supplemental payment (IME) claims

element.name: MaximumServiceLinesCmsClaim
element.documentation: Stores the maximum number of service lines on a claim for this benefit plan on a CMS claim.
element.question: Should data type be decimal or integer? Would think this is whole number.

element.name: AdjustmentsGroupSecondaryClaims
element.documentation: Grouper for transactions that are capitation adjustments that should be treated as payments in electronic secondary claims logic.

element.name: BenefitAdjustment
element.documentation: Remittance code to be associated with capitation adjustments that should be treated as payments in electronic secondary claims logic.

element.name: DefaultChargeTableId
element.documentation: Plan level default charge table ID to use during prescription medication charge calculations.

element.name: ChargeTableMedicationChargeId
element.documentation: Plan level charge table selection extension to use during prescription medication charge calculations

element.name: AdjudicatesChargeVia
element.documentation: This item specifies how this plan adjudicates prescriptions.

element.name: CoveredPercentage
element.documentation: Indicates the percentage of the price that the payer is responsible for if Specified Percentage is selected in the Adjudicate Charge Via item. The remaining balance will be charged to the patient.

element.name: AdjudicatesPayerAndPatient
element.documentation: The extension that determines how much the payer will pay and how much the patient will pay for the order.

element.name: CopyImeLines
element.documentation: Indicates whether claim lines from the source claim are copied into the IME claim.

element.name: UseInSharedCoverages
element.documentation: Indicates whether this plan will be used for shared coverages. When this item is set to yes, billing types (I EPP 85) must be set to 3 (can only have one line and must be

element.name: AdmissionBilling
element.documentation: Indicates whether admission daily billing is turned on for this plan.

element.name: CreatingSecondCoverageId
element.documentation: This item specifies a second interface items table, to be used when creating a coverage from an incoming message (rather than updating an existing coverage).

element.name: PreventSecondCoveragePlan
element.documentation: Level at which the plan will warn or stop the user from creating a coverage with the same payer/plan combination as another coverage on the applicable guarantor or hospital account. If nothing is set, the plan's payer's setting will be used. If nothing is set there, then the guarantor's Service Area's setting will be used. The default is 0-No Prevention.

element.name: LifetimeInformation
element.documentation: Benefit Plan Lifetime information.

idsSpecification.name: BenefitPlanLifetime
idsSpecification.elementOrder: MaximumLimitInPlan, MaximumLimitOutOfPlan, MaximumLimitForTotalAccumulation, MaximumDollarAmountInPlan, MaximumDollarAmountOutOfPlan, MaximumDollarAmountTotalAccumulation, MaximumPercentageOfTotalInPlan, MaximumPercentageOfTotalForOutOfPlan, MaximumPercentageOfTotalForAccumulation

include.name: CommonElements
include.appendToElementOrder: ExtendedAttributes, SourceStatusCode, SourceCreatedDate, SourceCreatedBy, SourceModifiedDate, SourceModifiedBy

idsSpecification.documentation: Use this structure to feed Benefit Plan Lifetime information.

element.name: MaximumLimitInPlan
element.documentation: The lifetime maximum buckets limit for in-plan buckets.

element.name: MaximumLimitOutOfPlan
element.documentation: The lifetime maximum buckets limit for out-of-plan buckets.

element.name: MaximumLimitForTotalAccumulation
element.documentation: The lifetime maximum buckets limit for total accumulation.

element.name: MaximumDollarAmountInPlan
element.documentation: The lifetime maximum buckets dollar amount threshold for in-plan buckets.

element.name: MaximumDollarAmountOutOfPlan
element.documentation: The lifetime maximum buckets dollar amount threshold for out-of-plan buckets.

element.name: MaximumDollarAmountTotalAccumulation
element.documentation: The lifetime maximum buckets dollar amount threshold for total accumulation of buckets.

element.name: MaximumPercentageOfTotalInPlan
element.documentation: The lifetime maximum buckets percentage of total threshold for in-plan buckets.

element.name: MaximumPercentageOfTotalForOutOfPlan
element.documentation: The lifetime maximum buckets percentage of total threshold for out-of-plan buckets.

element.name: MaximumPercentageOfTotalForAccumulation
element.documentation: The lifetime maximum buckets percentage of total threshold for total accumulation of buckets.

element.name: AnesthesiaInformation
element.documentation: Benefit Plan Provider Anesthesia information.

idsSpecification.name: BenefitPlanProviderAnesthesia

include.name: CommonElements
include.appendToElementOrder: ExtendedAttributes, SourceStatusCode, SourceCreatedDate, SourceCreatedBy, SourceModifiedDate, SourceModifiedBy

idsSpecification.documentation: Use this structure to feed Benefit Plan Provider Anesthesia information.

element.name: ApcGrouperDisplayPpId
element.documentation: This item holds the extension that displays an alternate view of the APC Grouper messages for a claim.

element.name: SaveApcGrouperPlusResponses
element.documentation: Indicates whether users can save the full details of the APC Grouper Plus responses in the CLP when data is loaded.

element.name: AnesthesiaPricingId
element.documentation: Anesthesia Pricing ID for this plan.

element.name: ShowAsaCode
element.documentation: Indicates whether to show ASA code on anesthesia claims.

element.name: AnesthesiaUnitsTimedProcedures
element.documentation: Indicates whether anesthesia timed procedures should be printed on claims in terms of units for this benefit plan.

element.name: AnesthesiaPhysicalStatusModifiers
element.documentation: Indicates whether to show physical status modifiers ("P" modifiers) on professional anesthesia claims.

element.name: FinancialClassInformation
element.documentation: Benefit Plan Financial Class information.

idsSpecification.name: BenefitPlanFinancialClass

include.name: CommonElements
include.appendToElementOrder: ExtendedAttributes, SourceStatusCode, SourceCreatedDate, SourceCreatedBy, SourceModifiedDate, SourceModifiedBy

idsSpecification.documentation: Use this structure to feed Benefit Plan Financial Class information.

element.name: ClassCode
element.documentation: The ID of the category corresponding to the financial class.

element.name: ClassName
element.documentation: The name of the financial class: Medicare, Commercial, Self-Pay, etc.

element.name: ClassTitle
element.documentation: The title of the financial class: Medicare, Commercial, Self-Pay, etc.

element.name: ClassAbbreviated
element.documentation: An abbreviated version of the financial class's name.

element.name: ExtraInformation
element.documentation: Benefit Plan Extra information.

idsSpecification.name: BenefitPlanExtraInformation
idsSpecification.elementOrder: UserAcceleratedSelfPay, DefaultDiagnosticRelatedGroupTypeId, BillingDrgTypeReferenceDateNumber, MixtureDispensingFee, BankInformationNumber, NonPrimaryBankInformationNumber, ProcessorControlNumber, NonPrimaryProcessorControlNumber, PayerSheetPpId, SupportsPartialPrescriptionFillsCode, AlternateIdentifierForProcedureCode, ProductTypeCategory, InclusionOfBadDebt, CapitationReconciliationRateTolerance, ManagedCareCoverageClass, TierBenefitPlan, AuthorizationContactPhoneNumber, ClaimMaxFileDays, PmtTypology, CheckingCrossoverRemit, CaseInsuranceWriteOff, CaseDebitAdjustment, AllowPrimaryCareProvidersAdding, CompareMembershipIdSubscriber5010, AllowPrimaryCareProvidersEditing, SurchargeGroup, PlanAppealWindow, AllowPrescriptionMedicationDefaults, SecondaryPlanClaimWindow, UniformDataType, OvertimeInformation

include.name: CommonElements
include.appendToElementOrder: ExtendedAttributes, SourceStatusCode, SourceCreatedDate, SourceCreatedBy, SourceModifiedDate, SourceModifiedBy

idsSpecification.documentation: Use this structure to feed Benefit Plan Extra Information.

element.name: UserAcceleratedSelfPay
element.documentation: Indicates whether accelerated self-pay is enabled for this plan.

element.name: DefaultDiagnosticRelatedGroupTypeId
element.documentation: The default DRG Type (MPI ID) used for billing by the benefit plan.

element.name: BillingDrgTypeReferenceDateNumber
element.documentation: The category number representing the reference date used to determine the Billing DRG Type for the benefit plan.

element.name: MixtureDispensingFee
element.documentation: The default mixture dispensing fee when calculating the plan price for prescription.

element.name: BankInformationNumber
element.documentation: The Bank Information Number (BIN) used during prescription adjudication. If blank at the plan level, the payer level BIN is used.

element.name: NonPrimaryBankInformationNumber
element.documentation: The Bank Information Number (BIN) used during prescription adjudication for non-primary coverages. Leave this field blank if the same BIN is used regardless of whether the coverage is primary or secondary. If no non-primary BIN is specified, the BIN will be used for non-primary coverages. If blank at the plan level, the payer level BINs are used.

element.name: ProcessorControlNumber
element.documentation: The Processor Control Number (PCN) used during prescription adjudication. If blank at the plan level the payer level PCN is used.

element.name: NonPrimaryProcessorControlNumber
element.documentation: The Processor Control Number (PCN) used during prescription adjudication for non-primary coverages. Leave this field blank if the same PCN is used regardless of whether the coverage is primary or secondary. If no non-primary PCN is specified, the PCN will be used for non-primary coverages. If blank at the plan level, the payer level PCNs are used.

element.name: PayerSheetPpId
element.documentation: Extension to select what payer sheet to use during prescription adjudication. If the extension does not return a value, the transaction table will be used to find the payer sheet. The plan level payer sheet extension is always checked first, then the plan level table, then the payer level payer sheet extension, and then the payer level table.

element.name: SupportsPartialPrescriptionFillsCode
element.documentation: Indicates whether the plan supports partial prescription fills. If blank at the plan level, the payer level setting is used.

element.name: AlternateIdentifierForProcedureCode
element.documentation: Alternate identifier for Procedure code in the Procedure master file

element.name: ProductTypeCategory
element.documentation: The product type category number for the benefit plan.

element.name: InclusionOfBadDebt
element.documentation: Flag to allow the inclusion of bad debt charges on claims. Will only affect PB claims processing.

element.name: CapitationReconciliationRateTolerance
element.documentation: Rate tolerance to be used when an incoming capitation reconciliation is done against a coverage with this plan.

element.name: ManagedCareCoverageClass
element.documentation: Managed care coverage class of the plan.

element.name: TierBenefitPlan
element.documentation: Plan-level flag as tiered benefits plan.

element.name: AuthorizationContactPhoneNumber
element.documentation: The phone number for the authorization contact at this plan.

element.name: ClaimMaxFileDays
element.documentation: Plan specific limit on the number of days from the date of service by which claims must be filed.

element.name: PmtTypology
element.documentation: This item is being created to store typology codes.

element.name: CheckingCrossoverRemit
element.documentation: Flag to allow checking the plan level crossover exceptions, even if the information in the remit file is respected and it says a crossover claim has been sent.

element.name: CaseInsuranceWriteOff
element.documentation: The insurance write-off procedure used to write off case charges to zero balance in case rate insurance payment posting.

element.name: CaseDebitAdjustment
element.documentation: The insurance debit adjustment procedure used to offset the overpaid portion of an insurance payment.

element.name: AllowPrimaryCareProvidersAdding
element.documentation: A category value that indicates if users are able to edit Primary Care Providers within the Care Teams activity from outside of Tapestry.

element.name: CompareMembershipIdSubscriber5010
element.documentation: ANSI 5010 claims now have new requirements for the way loop L2000BHL should be populated when the patient is a dependent. If the patient has an identical subscriber ID and member ID, the system sends both the subscriber and the member loops. If the patient has a subscriber ID and a member ID, but those IDs are not the same, the system sends the subscriber loop only. If the patient has a subscriber ID only or a member ID only, the system sends the same ID in the subscriber ID and member ID loops. To override this logic at the benefit plan level, item Compare Subscriber ID to Member ID for ANSI 837 V5010 L2000B? should be set to 1. This column holds the value of COMPARE SUB ID TO MEM ID FOR ANSI 837 5010 L2000B?

element.name: AllowPrimaryCareProvidersEditing
element.documentation: A category value that indicates if users are able to edit Primary Care Providers within the Care Teams activity from outside of Tapestry.

element.name: SurchargeGroup
element.documentation: This item stores the grouper that this plan falls into for the NY State Surcharge report.

element.name: PlanAppealWindow
element.documentation: The number of days a plan allows for appeal of denials or underpayments.

element.name: AllowPrescriptionMedicationDefaults
element.documentation: Select yes if this plan allows prescription defaults. No is the default if left blank. Prescription or medication order, the organizing of a supply of a medication and the administration of the medication to a patient. It differs from the Medication domain, which defines the overall description of a medicine.

element.name: SecondaryPlanClaimWindow
element.documentation: The number of days a plan allows for initial filing of secondary claim

element.name: UniformDataType
element.documentation: Marks the benefit plan with one of the Uniform Data System benefit plan category values.

list.name: OvertimeInformation
list.documentation: Use this collection to specify Benefit Plan Overtime Information.

idsSpecification.name: BenefitPlanOvertimeInformation
idsSpecification.elementOrder: ContactUpdateDate, ContactUpdateType, ContactUpdateComment, BenefitPlanPackageName, IsBenefitPackageReal, TieredBenefitsContact, BenefitPackageId, DiagnosisCodeSet, IcdPreferredProcedureCodeSet

include.name: CommonElements
include.appendToElementOrder: ExtendedAttributes, SourceStatusCode, SourceCreatedDate, SourceCreatedBy, SourceModifiedDate, SourceModifiedBy

idsSpecification.documentation: Use this structure to feed Benefit Plan Overtime information.

element.name: ContactUpdateDate
element.documentation: The contact date of the benefit plan in standard date format.

element.name: ContactUpdateType
element.documentation: Indicates the type of the contact for this benefit plan - initial entry or update.

element.name: ContactUpdateComment
element.documentation: The comment for this contact.

element.name: BenefitPlanPackageName
element.documentation: The name of the benefit package for this benefit plan. The name of the benefit package is in the column BEN_PACKAGE_NAME.

element.name: IsBenefitPackageReal
element.documentation: Indicates if the Benefit Package and its corresponding Limit and Payment Parameters are ready to be used.

element.name: TieredBenefitsContact
element.documentation: Contact-level flag for a tiered benefits plan.

element.name: BenefitPackageId
element.documentation: The ID of the benefit package for this benefit plan. The ID of the benefit package is in the column BEN_PACKAGE_ID.

element.name: DiagnosisCodeSet
element.documentation: The preferred diagnosis code category number set for the plan.

element.name: IcdPreferredProcedureCodeSet
element.documentation: The preferred ICD procedure code category number set for the plan.

list.name: Subscribers
list.documentation: Use this collection to specify Subscriber For Coverage information.
